cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.MM, cs.DS, cs.GR

Reasoning: The paper deals with image segmentation, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of distance functions and thresholding methods also suggests relevance to information retrieval (cs.IR) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also mentions the use of synthetic images, which could fall under data structures (cs.DS) or graphics (cs.GR).
